title: 怎么在NPCMOD里添加皮肤以及歌？
author: 一梓猫

replies.author: Killot
replies.txt_content:
皮肤扔进npc压缩包-assets文件夹-customnpcs文件夹-textures文件夹-entity文件夹-自创新文件夹即可
歌曲扔进npc压缩包-assets文件夹-customnpcs文件夹-music文件夹-自创新文件夹即可

replies.author: TOMJKKKK
replies.txt_content: 歌在 music文件夹里，拖进去就可以了

replies.author: Killot
replies.txt_content:
